body: Thank you reporting this issue. I hope I (or someone else) has time to look into this in near future.

Hi,
any update for this issue please ?

Regards,

issue.title: Deserializing enum by using String argument @JsonCreator method fails in 2.11.0

repository.name: jackson-databind
repository.description: General data-binding package for Jackson (2.x): works on streaming API (core) implementation(s)

issue.title: Introduce new features for breaking build by OWASP Dependency Scan

repository.name: fosstars-rating-core
repository.description: A framework for defining ratings for open source projects. In particular, the framework offers a security rating for open source projects that may be used to assess the security risk that comes with open source components.

issue.body:
Here is a list of main updates:

- Introduced new features and a score that shows how the project uses UsesOwaspDependencyScan.
- Added a new data provider that gathers information about the new features.
- Introduced new tests and test vectors.

This fixes #237

issue.title: EnumValue deserialization fails

repository.name: fosstars-rating-core
repository.description: A framework for defining ratings for open source projects. In particular, the framework offers a security rating for open source projects that may be used to assess the security risk that comes with open source components.

issue.body:
In reference to https://github.com/SAP/fosstars-rating-core/pull/263#discussion_r453525569

As per the discussion `jackson-databind` seems to have resolved this issue FasterXML/jackson-databind#2605

But still the unit test https://github.com/SAP/fosstars-rating-core/blob/master/src/test/java/com/sap/sgs/phosphor/fosstars/model/value/EnumValueTest.java#L88 fails.

This has to be resolved. The issue seems to be fixed with `jackson-databind:2.11.1`.
